Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; traces of added red and added white bands and, below, alternating red and white tongues; exterior, from top: trace of guilloche pattern; four wide bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1585) (phase 2)
